pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `okdata-cli`: Oslo Origo data services CLIOkdata CLI provides a unified interface to data services for Oslo Origo teams.* [Install](doc/install.md)* [Configuration](doc/configuration.md)* [Public registers](doc/pubreg.md)* [Teams](doc/teams.md)* [Datasets](doc/datasets.md)* [Permissions](doc/permissions.md)
